Name: 炸弹狂欢
About the game: Bomberfest is a 3D bomberman-style strategy game developed by Unity. In the game, players take their characters on adventures in a world made up of blocks and other elements, using bombs to blast open boxes to collect items, and using bombs to destroy various enemies. Bomberfest is a 3D bomberman-style strategy game developed by Unity. In the game, players take their characters on adventures in a world made up of blocks and other elements, using bombs to blast open boxes to collect items, and using bombs to destroy various enemies. The game includes a variety of characters with different skill styles, who can play to their strengths in different situations. About the new adventure mode: It is said that there is a secret hidden in Level-8. Some say that there are countless rarities, some say that a terrible demon is imprisoned there, others say that it is nothing but a void. There has never been evidence of anything hidden in Level-8, because no one who has been there has ever returned. Of course, they could have died on other levels, and it's all just a myth. You take on the role of one of four optional characters as you embark on an adventure to Level-8, either alone or with your AI teammates, exploring one weird and thrilling Level after another, battling a plethora of enemies and assorted monsters, and trying to survive the roar of bomb blasts. Using the combination of Roguelike and bomb-man game elements, the game scene is presented to the player in a completely 3D screen. Each time the player goes on an adventure, the scene will be different. Note: There is no advertising of any kind, and the game is completely free to play with a variety of characters with different skills and styles, who can use their strengths in different situations.
